page.title: 16SHEARING AT WOMERTON FARM
page.content: A sheep has to be sheared in{spring } otherwise it would get very hot and it would have to carry alot of extra weight around.In the{winter}the sheep has a greasy layer of{lanolin}on it to keep it warm.You shear a sheep with a big{ten bladed electric}razor.when you have sheared the sheep you pack the {fleece,}roll it once then tuck the sides in roll it again, then you twist the bit that's left, wrap it around the fleece and tuck the twisted end in. Then it is ready to be taken to the{wool factory.}
